title: 90/49/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 January 1990 amending Decision 89/589/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany and the Hellenic Republic to restrict the marketing of seed of certain varieties of agricultural plant species (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 January 1990
amending Decision 89/589/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany and the Hellenic Republic to restrict the marketing of seed of certain varieties of agricultural plant species
(Only the German text is authentic)
(90/49/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Decision 89/589/EEC, in the list of varieties of Zea mays L. (maize) in Article 1 (2), 'Pablo' is inserted after 'Otello'.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 January 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 225, 12. 10. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 187, 16. 7. 1988, p. 31.
(3) OJ No L 331, 16. 11. 1989, p. 46.
